Inverse **
=====================================================

### Tender Announcement: Aircraft Accessories and Components Repairs and Overhauls

**Reference Number:** cb-7191-68793210
**Solicitation Number:** T8493-23-xxxx/B
**Publication Date:** July 13, 2023
**Closing Date:** September 1, 2023, 14:00:00

**Contract Information:**

*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
*   Contracting Entity Name: Transport Canada
*   Contracting Entity Address: 200 Comet Private, Ottawa, ON, K1V 9B2

**Tender Description:**
Transport Canada's Aircraft Service Directorate (ASD) is seeking proposals for engine repair and overhaul services for the following engine series: Pratt & Whitney (JT15D-4, PT6, PW207D, PW120, PW121) and Rolls-Royce (250-C47, 250-C20). The services must include inspection, repair, overhaul, modification, advanced exchange, testing, recertification, and lease of engines, components, and associated line replaceable units.

**Basis of Selection:**

*   Approved Engine Repair and Overhaul Facility for Pratt & Whitney and Rolls-Royce engine models and series.
*   Transport Canada Approved Maintenance Organization (AMO) or Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) Approved Repair Station for the engine models and series.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

*   The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Trade Agreement Considerations:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) respects the World Trade Organization – Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA) prescriptions.

**Submission Instructions:**

*   All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than seven (7) calendar days before the bid closing date.
*   Faxed or emailed requests will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**
Leslie Siegman, leslie.siegman@tc.gc.ca, (613) 668-4592

**Documents:**
Please visit [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) to access the bid solicitation and supporting documents.  [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7191/t8493-23xxxx_a-%28pw_rr_eng.pdf)[2](
